tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor has the patience to listen carefully to the problem, ask relevant questions and give comforting advice with minimal medication.  The doctor keenly follows up with the patient till such time the problem is solved. In cases where specialist attention is required, she makes it known why such attention is required.  In general this doctor gives the patient a lot of confidence and comfort which takes care of the problem psychologically and most of the treatment is done.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Neelam is a very warm and approachable doctor. My family and I only consult with her as our GP and her medication always works for us. Her warm nature and patience listening to every patient is truly commendable. She was a God sent to us when my mother had to go into emergency for Hernia and Dr Neelam herself ensured my mother got the best treatment at an unusual hour. I would highly recommend Dr Neelam and have referred her to several of my friends and colleagues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We have visited Dr Neelam and we are extremely satisfied with the treatment. She doesn't advice too any medications and unnecessary investigation. She has lots of patience while listening to our concern. Specially my elderly parents. Clinic is on the main road and it is maintained very well and friendly front office staff. Timely follow up. I would highly recommend Dr Neelam.
Wife later diagnosed with thyroiditis at manipal but the mentioned doctor just gave us vitamin d earlier when we visited for the neck pain issue * ****** ***** ***** *** *******

Despite the doctor suggesting tests and referring to a higher institute after three days, *** ******* ********** **** **** **** * ************* ******* **** ****** ****** *** ******* ***** Additionally, the receptionist's rudeness further soured the experience. I wouldn't recommend this doctor to anyone seeking genuine patient care.

I’ll start with basic procedures, upon arriving at the clinic, the receptionist insisted on payment before the consultation. Despite the doctor suggesting tests and referring to a higher institute after three days, *** ******* ********** **** **** **** * ************* ******* **** ****** ****** *** ******* ***** Additionally, the receptionist's rudeness further soured the experience. Visited the doc for high fever and constant cough. Without much diagnosis, the doctor immediately (within 30 seconds) suggested to hospitalize the patient. She didn’t even explain what’s wrong with the patient. While writing the prescription, she was also insistent to instantaneously making the decision to admit the patient. When we mentioned, we will need time to think, she mentioned another doc will take a look at the patient.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
I visited the clinic with symptoms of fever and cough. The doctor was patient to hear about the symptoms, medicines already taken etc. and then advised further medication. Unfortunately I turned out to be covid positive.

The doctor was always supportive and was reachable throughout my course of medicine over tele-consultation. She gave lot of confidence and assurance which is required along with the medicines for such patients.

I highly recommend Dr. Neelam and would visit her only in case I need any medical help further.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr. Neelam for fever and nose bleed. The clinic is well maintained with good support staff. The doctor gave me ample time to explain my symptoms. She gave a good diagnosis and treatment to which I am satisfied. I would recommend this clinic and doctor

Doc is friendly, no waiting time, what didn't work for me was the diagnosis she did not asked me anything other than what i told her, i told i am getting blood with stool, and pain and fever, she prescribed me antibiotics, antiacid and laxative, she did not even cared about the reason, she did not explained me the problem or cause of it, she considerd my problem as piles and gave prescription ***** ****** ****** ** ******* **** ** ********* **** ****** She even did not try to find out if it id piles or Fistula or Fissure i have Thyroid problem too,which i forgot to mention she also didn't ask
******* *** ****** **** **** ****** ********* ** ** *** *** *** ********* ** ******* ** ******* *** ****** **** **** ** ** *** ******* ****
